segments.text: Hi , may I get you anything to drink ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , please . May I get a glass of lemonade ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: May I get an order of barbeque wings ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , would you like anything else ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That'll be fine for now , thank you .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Okay , tell me when you want to order the rest of your food .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Excuse me . I'm ready to order .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let me have the baby-back ribs .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Sure , will there be anything else that I can get you ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That will be it for now .
segments.speaker: S2
